cf.description: Flip the coin, earn some gold!
cf.err1: **{{- author }}|**Please choose either **heads** or **tails** to start playing.

**{{- author }} ** spent **{{ bet }} {{- goldIcon }}** and chose **heads**
The coin spins... and landed on **heads** {{-headsIcon }}.You won!! **{{ win }} {{- goldIcon }}**
cf.heads_lose:
**{{- author }} ** spent **{{ bet }} {{- goldIcon }}** and chose **tails**
The coin spins... and landed on **heads** {{-headsIcon }}.You lost it all...
cf.tails_win:

The coin spins... and landed on **tails** {{-tailsIcon }}.You lost it all...
